original_text: But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were furious and began to discuss with one another what they might do to Jesus.
korean_text: 그들은 노기가 가득하여 예수를 어떻게 할까 하고 서로 의논하니라

sentences.original_text: But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were furious
and began to discuss with one another
what they might do to Jesus
